Description: This project implements a multi-agent system using the Magentic-One agent from Autogen, deployed on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS). It provides a framework for collaborative problem-solving using specialized AI agents that can interact with various Azure services including Azure OpenAI, Azure Monitor, and Dynatrace. The system demonstrates how to build and deploy AI-powered agents in a Kubernetes environment, showcasing best practices for containerization, security, and integration with Azure services.
BusinessGoals: Demonstrate the implementation of AI-powered multi-agent systems in Azure Kubernetes Service
Showcase best practices for integrating Azure services with AI agents
Provide a reference architecture for building scalable AI solutions on Azure
Enable customers to accelerate their AI adoption by providing a production-ready sample
Illustrate how to implement secure and maintainable AI solutions in enterprise environments
